nodes.text: The siege of Kaleth happened during Rajivari's purges after Jedi Master Rajivari was killed in his attempt to reform the Jedi Order, which he had co-founded, and his followers barricaded in Rajivari's fortress of Kaleth, where they put up a last stand fight against the Order. All of Rajivari's followers were killed as a result and the conflict was officially ended.
